title: Client not updating properly anymore
body:
I just got a new computer and I wanted to install league of legends on the computer. Once I got to the launcher where it updates the game to current patches it gets stuck at "Applying Patches" 79% and eventually crashes into a bugsplat error message. I've tried every solution from the riot support page. I reinstalled a lot of times, nothing fixes the issue. I have no firewall installed and did nothing but install steam and LoL so far. Does anyone have any idea what else I could do? My internet connection is perfectly stable and not wireless.
http://i.imgur.com/sJGHhde.png

replies.body: I'm sorry you're having issues patching, that's no bueno. Sounds like you're getting a consistent repro so send me your largest LoLPatcher logs or whichever logs list a "Failure" so I can take a closer look OR you can zip them up through the help option at the top right of the patcher. Sending me the entire log folder is actually better and will give me a better idea of what is going on with your client. Thanks ^^~
If the zip is too large to attach to the website, just go with the first option or add the zip folder to google drive or dropbox and set it to public so I can download it.

> [{quoted}](name=Trill Collins,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qdrb1PIx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-14T22:11:35.413+0000)
>
> If the zip is too large to attach to the website, just go with the first option or add the zip folder to google drive or dropbox and set it to public so I can download it.

I fixed the issue already. Sorry for the delay. My problem was that the language was set to EN_US or something like that (a friend of mine helped me with it as he already experienced it)

Hey guys I am having this same exact issue. I tried changing my language settings but nothing is working. Can you post a detailed description of what fixed this? I have been sitting on "Applying Patches" at 79% for about 45mins now...
